file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 79-11-02-04 - CHIP COLLECTOR DRAIN VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CHIP COLLECTOR DRAIN VALVE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the chip-collector drain valve. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY CHIP-COLLECTOR DRAIN VALVE - RE- ALL 79-11-02-000-801-A MOVAL CHIP-COLLECTOR DRAIN VALVE - IN- ALL 79-11-02-400-801-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 79-11-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 79-11-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. CHIP-COLLECTOR DRAIN VALVE - REMOVAL A. General (1) To do the task, refer to the instructions given in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 71-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - OPENING C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 Lower Cowling LH Engine 423 Lower Cowling RH Engine D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the engine 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN ( AMM MPP 71-00-00/200) TO PREVENT INJURY TO THE PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them: • START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 79-11-02 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • FADEC 1A/2A. • FADEC 1B/2B. (2) Open the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-000-801-A/400) to get access to the engine. (3) Put the ladder in the work area. J. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the chip-collector drain valve. Refer to the last revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 79-11-02 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 79-11-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. CHIP-COLLECTOR DRAIN VALVE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) To do the task, refer to the instructions given in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE LOWER COWLING - CLOSING C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the engine 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the chip-collector drain valve. Refer to the last revision of Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the lower cowling ( AMM TASK 71-12-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the ladder. (3) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers below and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from them. • START 1/2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 79-11-02 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • FADEC 1A/2A. • FADEC 1B/2B. (4) Refer to the Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 to do the related check procedures after an engine LRU maintenance procedure, as applicable.
